EmailTemplate.name: Career Inquiries
EmailTemplate.subject: Borrego Solar: Responding to your inquiry
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName},
Thank you for your interest in Borrego Solar. All of our available positions are posted on our website at http://www.borregosolar.com/commercial-solar-energy-systems-company/careers/.
If any of these openings are of interest to you, please follow the instructions to apply online.
Best of luck,
{!Lead.OwnerFullName}
